text: Bruce William Doepke (born March 15, 1950), also known as Jack Doepke, is a retired American actor. He is known for his portrayal as Ronald McDonald in the McDonald's commercials from 1991 to 1999 and in The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald, replacing Squire Fridell. After retiring from acting, Doepke now works as a programmer-technician. ==Personal life== Doepke was previously married to Dawn Watson from 1976 to 1985. Doepke has been married to his second wife Carol Jean Doll since October 1, 1989, together they have two children. ==Filmography== ===Direct-to-video=== *The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald (1998–1999) - Ronald McDonald ===Documentary films=== *A Friend Indeed: The Bill Sackter Story (2008) - Himself ===Commercials=== *McDonald's - Ronald McDonald (1991–1999) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Living people
title: Jack Doepke
